entities.id: Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry
entities.label: Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry

edges.label: 1. Intelligence Gathering
edges.tooltip: NSA conducted SIGINT operations to intercept communications within the Japanese Government.

edges.label: 2. Climate Policy Proposal
edges.tooltip: The Japanese Government aimed to propose a sectoral approach to emission reductions at the G-8 Summit.

edges.label: 3. Leadership Role
edges.tooltip: Chief Cabinet Secretary Nobutaka Machimura was involved in strategizing Japan's climate policy goals.

edges.label: 4. Methodology Used
edges.tooltip: NSA utilized SIGINT operations to gather intelligence on Japanese climate policy strategies.

edges.source: Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry
edges.label: 5. Involvement in Climate Agenda
edges.tooltip: The Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry was involved in formulating Japan's climate policy.

edges.label: 6. Involvement in Climate Agenda
edges.tooltip: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs was involved in formulating Japan's climate policy.

edges.label: 7. Involvement in Climate Agenda
edges.tooltip: The Ministry of Finance was involved in formulating Japan's climate policy.

edges.label: 8. Involvement in Climate Agenda
edges.tooltip: The Ministry of Environment was involved in formulating Japan's climate policy.

NSA: Interception of confidential Japanese G-8 proposals on climate change.
